price: Бу кунда жаннат эгалари кўнгиллари тусаган иш ила банд бўлурлар.
arabic: إِنَّ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ فِي شُغُلٖ فَٰكِهُونَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: inna aṣḥāba al-janati al-yawma fī shughulin fākihūna
